name: Huma Finance
description: Huma Finance is the first PayFi network, powering the financing of global payments with instant access to liquidity - anywhere, anytime. Huma Finance enables global payment institutions to settle their payments 24/7 using stablecoins and liquidity on-chain. It powers settlements for a range of PayFi use cases such as cross-border payments, credit cards, trade finance, and enables novel solutions like DePiN financing.
